definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Palaeontologists have different opinions on the process of the transition.
sentences.chinese: 古生物学家对于转变的过程有不同的观点。

sentences.english: Some paleontologists argued that these whiskers were simple feathers.
sentences.chinese: 一些古生物学家这些胡须就是简单的羽毛。

sentences.english: This paper is dedicated to academician Sheng Jinzhang, a famous paleontologist.
sentences.chinese: 专此纪念著名的古生物学家盛金章院士。

sentences.english: This programme documents the treasure hunt of a group of the most eminent palaeontologists in the world.
sentences.chinese: 世界上一批最杰出的古生物学家提出了一个方案。
塞瑞诺是位知名的古生物学家。

sentences.english: Paleontologists know chert as a good place to look for fossils.
sentences.chinese: 古生物学者知道黑矽石同样的好地方去观看化石。

sentences.english: HAS now been restored in the Palaeontological Museum in Leningrad.
sentences.chinese: 这一猛犸遗骸现已修复陈列在列宁格勒古生物博物馆。

sentences.english: The work appears in the journal Paleobiology.
sentences.chinese: 研究报告发表在《古生物学》杂志上。

sentences.english: None of my questions have anything to do with paleontology.
sentences.chinese: 我的问题没有一条是关于古生物学的。

sentences.english: Other paleontologists say Berger’s fossils are a marvelous find.
sentences.chinese: 其他的古生物学家说伯格尔的化石是一个非凡的发现。

sentences.english: Information about paleoclimates is increasingly available, and being used in paleontology.
sentences.chinese: 关于古气候的信息越来越多，并且被用于古生物学。

sentences.english: This site is a complex information resource on paleontological and zoological classification.
sentences.chinese: 此站点提供有关古生物学和动物学分类的信息资源。

sentences.english: She is a specialist in paleontology.
sentences.chinese: 她是古生物学方面的专家。

sentences.english: This allowed the researchers to paint a monochrome picture of both ancient creatures.
sentences.chinese: 这就使得科学家可以画出这两种古生物的黑白复原图。

sentences.english: Electing new officials of the International Palaeontological Association.
sentences.chinese: 选举新一届国际古生物学会领导成员。

sentences.english: Paleontologists also debated whether Archaeopteryx could fly.
sentences.chinese: 古生物学家还讨论了始祖鸟是否会飞的问题。

definition: ancient hominid species such as Homo erectus, Neanderthal man etc
fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
